channel.title: xml2 on yet another rstats blog
channel.description: Recent content in xml2 on yet another rstats blog

item.title: Parsing XML with ~~`xml2`~~ `tidyr`
item.description: When I first discovered xml2, I was thrilled. A product from RStudio that works with XML! So great! I had some large XML documents I had to parse at work, and my best solution (before we got RStudio) was to drag them one at a time into Microsoft Excel and let its parser convert each into one big, ugly table. Then I was left to either create some elaborate formulas to extract the relevant info, or pass the table on to SAS and try to wrangle it there.
